pageContext.claim: “Now they're opening up plans, U.S. Steel, Nucor. They're opening up plants all over the country, big ones, new ones.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. Steel has not announced the opening of eight or nine facilities, nor is there evidence that Trump had a phone call with the head of U.S. Steel. The company has only announced the reopening of two blast furnaces at a plant in Illinois.
